Package pattpack.account

This package has been coded to show the use of various factory patterns.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AccountEconomy Class abstracting an economy account.
AccountIF Base class of all accounts.
SecurityManagerEconomy Security manager of an economy account.
SecurityManagerIF Interface of all security managers of an account.
User This class represents a user of the internet service provider.
 

Exception Summary
LimitsException Exception thrown when an account usage exceeds its limits.
 

Package pattpack.account Description

This package has been coded to show the use of various factory patterns. The package minimally abstracts a computer account and a security manager that checks that the limits imposed on the account are respected.
